summary: Engage on riddle solving quest and obtain seven dolls
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]The dolls of the famous Valenwood toymaker Irna Jullalian,has been located somewhere in Skyrim.
The shady merchant appears in Karthwasten and has the written loctions of all eight dolls.
There is just one catch,the locations are written in riddles.
Solve the riddles and get the collection.

Start the quest by going to Karthwasten and buying the seven riddles from shady merchant.

The Dolls look great together,and if you do not like them you can sell them from a high price.[/size][/font]
[i]
Text below shows locations of dolls for those who have trouble solving the riddles :
1. Red Doll -  [spoiler] Cancelmo's Lab [/spoiler]
2. Knight Doll -  [spoiler] Dawnguard Fort [/spoiler]
3. Dragon Doll - -  [spoiler] High Hrothgar [/spoiler]
4. Missy Doll - -  [spoiler] Shadowgreen Cavern [/spoiler]
5. Schoolar Doll - -  [spoiler] W. the Unliving Lab [/spoiler]
6. Summertime Doll - -  [spoiler] Wolfskull Cavern [/spoiler]
7. Sister Doll - [/i][i]-  [spoiler] Ysolda's House,Whiterun [/spoiler][/i]

Credits :
author: Leftounge And Ibrica15
